settings.main_heading: Design & Customize Your New Home From Scratch
settings.main_paragraph:
Have you browsed our collection, loved the designs but just haven’t quite found a design that perfectly fits your family’s needs? 

Work with Mike Garrell, the Founder of Garrell Associates directly and take advantage of his 20+ years of experience in designing thousands of new custom homes. Take designs directly from your imagination and put them to paper. 


If you prefer a closer relationship with your designer and the ability to have a direct line of communication with the designer, this is the premier solution for designing your home.

settings.customize_Content: In order to receive your free modification quote, please fill out the from below. Be as detailed and descriptive as possible.
